auction

Class Auction

  • java.lang.Object
    • auction.Auction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Auction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Auction of the antiquary.
    Author:
    David Nevado Catalan, Jorge Arellano Subias
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Auction

        public Auction(int duration,
               double minIncrement,
               double minPrice,
               Auctionable auctionable,
               java.util.ArrayList<Customer> mailingList)
        throws InvalidArgumentsException,
               StateTransitionException
        Auction constructor. Creates an auction given its duration, minimum bid increase, id, the auctionable to set in auction.
        Parameters:
        duration - Duration of the auction since the first bid.
        minIncrement - Minimum increase of the bids.
        minPrice - Minimum price of the auction
        auctionable - Auctionable in auction
        mailingList - Customers that will receive a notification
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentsException - when an invalid argument has been introduced, negative duration or increment, or not items for auction are specified
        StateTransitionException - when a not available item is trying to added

        minIncrement - Minimum increase of the bids.
        minPrice - Minimum price of the auction

        StateTransitionException - when a not available item is trying to added

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
           throws InvalidAuctionAction
        Closes the auction. Therefore the auction passes to the closed state and it is permanently finished
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when the auction is already closed, cancelled or opened.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
            throws InvalidAuctionAction
        Cancels the auction. Therefore the auction passes to the cancelled state and it is permanently finished
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when the auction is already cancelled, closed or opened.

      • addParticipant

        public void addParticipant(ContractCustomer newParticipant)
                    throws InvalidAuctionAction
        Adds a participant to the auction
        Parameters:
        newParticipant - Customer added to the auction
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when the auction is not available or the customer is already added

      • addToMailingList

        public void addToMailingList(Customer client)
        Adds a customer to the mailing list If the client was already in the mailing list nothing will occur
        Parameters:
        client - Customer added to the mailingList

      • removeFromMailingList

        public void removeFromMailingList(Customer client)
        Removes a customer from the mailing list. If the customer was not in the mailing list nothing will occur
        Parameters:
        client - Customer removed from the mailingList

      • daysRemaining

        public int daysRemaining()
                  throws InvalidAuctionAction
        Calculates the days remaining of a running auction.
        Returns:
        Days remaining of a running auction.
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when the auction is not in the running state

      • addBid

        public boolean addBid(Bid newBid)
               throws InvalidAuctionAction,
                      es.uam.eps.padsof.emailconnection.EmailException
        Adds a new bid to the auction. It also puts the auction into running state and sets it start date if it is the first bid. It also updates the highest bid. If the customer making the bid was not participating in the auction he will be added
        Parameters:
        newBid - bid to be added.
        Returns:
        flag true if the client who made the bid was not participating and therefore must pay the fee (this will also depend on his contract)
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when the auction is not available
        es.uam.eps.padsof.emailconnection.EmailException - when a notification of the bid could not be sent

      • getMaxBid

        public Bid getMaxBid()
              throws InvalidAuctionAction
        Gets the current highest bid made in the auction
        Returns:
        Highest bid made in the auction
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when no bids have been made yet.

      • getWinner

        public ContractCustomer getWinner()
                           throws InvalidAuctionAction
        Gets the current winner of the auction
        Returns:
        Customer who made the highest bid
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when no bids have been made yet.

        public int getId()
        Id getter
        Returns:
        Auction id

        public java.time.LocalDate getEndDate()
                               throws InvalidAuctionAction
        Returns the closing date of the auction
        Returns:
        Date in which the auction was closed
        Throws:
        InvalidAuctionAction - when the auction is not closed
